content.question: What is the total work done on the gas as it is taken from State <math alttext="W" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></math> to State <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="negative P sub 0, end sub, times V sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>
<math alttext="negative 2 P sub 0, end sub, times V sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>
<math alttext="negative 4 P sub 0, end sub, times V sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="negative 2 P sub 0, end sub, times V sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
